```{r}
library(textclean)
```

```{r}

```

```{r}
names(naturtyper) <- textclean::replace_non_ascii(names(naturtyper))
```

```{r}
temp <- naturtyper %>%
  group_by(kartleggingsar) %>%
  summarise(count = n())
```

```{r}
ggplot(temp, aes(x = kartleggingsar, y = count))+
  geom_bar(stat="identity")+
  theme_anders()
```
